summary: This module serves as a thin wrapper that lazily re-exports the sparse linear algebra functionality from the underlying SciPy-compatible submodule, allowing users to access solvers and related utilities through the CuPy sparse.linalg namespace without incurring import costs upfront.
business_intent: Enable efficient access to sparse linear algebra solvers (e.g., CG, GMRES) within the CuPy ecosystem while maintaining compatibility with SciPy-like APIs and minimizing import overhead.
